Text:
I know this is a huge and time-consuming request but is there any chance you have access to and can upload the "Journal of Industrial and Engineering Chemistry" (American Chemical Society, 1924-1970)?  A user on the SuprBay Forum is having difficulty finding a complete run of the journal and would much appreciate any help you can provide.  Please feel free to respond on that thread: 

http://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=146799&pid=859188#pid859188

Many thanks in advance for your consideration!
